item.title: [ 44] /mlb/

PREVIOUS: >>148443706

TB: Taylor Walls drew a bases-loaded walk in the eighth to break a tie as the Rays edged the Brewers 4-3 on Friday
NYM: Clay Holmes allowed three hits and one run with three walks and five strikeouts over six innings in a 7-2 win over the Cubs
STL: Erick Fedde tossed his first career shutout against his former team as the Cardinals crushed the Nationals 10-0 on Friday
CIN: Reds transferred INF/OF Tyler Callihan to the 60-day injured list
SD: Padres acquired RHP Andrew Moore and cash considerations from the Reds for 1B/OF Connor Joe
DET: Colt Keith went 2-for-3 with a run scored and an RBI on Friday night, leading the Tigers to a 2-1 victory over the Rangers and their fifth consecutive victory
PIT: Bailey Falter shut out the Braves for six innings in the Pirates’ 3-2 victory Friday
CWS: According to Vinnie Duber, the White Sox plan to promote top prospect Tim Elko on Saturday

item.title: [ 31] /pcbg/ - PC Building General
item.description:
Radeon Won Edition

>UPGRADE & BUILD ADVICE.
Post build list or current specs including MONITOR: https://pcpartpicker.com/
Provide specific use cases.
State BUDGET and COUNTRY or you will NOT be helped.
Building guide: https://wiki.installgentoo.com/index.php/Build_a_PC

>CASE (from $ to $$$)
mATX: Asus Prime AP201, Lian Li A3, O11 Air Mini
ATX: Phanteks XT PRO (ULTRA), Montech AIR 903 Base/MAX, Lian Li Lancool 207, Antec C8, Antec Flux Pro
AVOID: NXZT, 'Silent' cases, fanless cases, Corsair 6500

>CPU
Budget: 9600X, 7600X, 7500f
Gaming: AMD X3D
Workstation: 9950X, 7950X
AVOID Shittel

>COOLER
AIO: Best Value: Thermalright Frozen Prism, Premium LCD: Lian Li Galahad II LCD
Double towers: Thermalright Phantom Spirit 120 SE, Noctua NH-D15 G2
ITX/>42mm RAM: Scythe Fuma 3/TR AXP120-X67

>MOTHERBOARD
ASRock B850M-X, ASRock B850 LiveMixer WiFi, ASRock X870 Pro RS, ASRock Phantom Gaming X870E Nova WiFi

>RAM
DDR4: 2x16GB 3200CL16. Budget, 2x8GB
DDR5: 2x16GB 6000CL30
Workstation/high end: consider 2x32GB

>SSD (OS drive)
Budget: Silicon Power UD90
Mid range: SN770
Premium: SN850X
Flagship: Sabrent Rocket 5

>GPU
1080p: No VRAM: RTX 5060 and RTX 5060 TI 8GB, Fake Frames: RTX 5060 TI 16GB, Real Performance: RX 9060 XT
1440p: Fake Frames: RTX 5070 TI, Real Performance: RX 9070 XT, Budget: RX 9060 XT
4K: Fire Starter: RTX 5090, Scam Enjoyer: RTX 5080, Affordable: 9070 XT
Workstation: AVOID AMD cards
Value For Money: AVOID Ngreedia cards
ALWAYS pair AMD GPUs with AMD CPUs for SAM https://imgur.com/a/7XecPGL

>PSU
PSU buying guide:
https://hwbusters.com/best_picks/best-atxv3-pcie5-ready-psus-picks-hardware-busters/

>MONITOR
https://pcmonitors.info/recommendations/

>OS
Activate Windows @ >>>/g/fwt

>CASE FANS
Meta: Case with good stock PWM fans
Mid range: Arctic P12/P14 (Max) (5-pack)
High end: Noctua NF-A12x25, Noctua NF-A14x25 G2

Previous: >>105214332

Original filename: Radeon Won.png

item.title: [ 30] Got fired from cartoon network (Adult Swim) a few weeks ago - lets talk
item.description:
First, I was fired from Cartoon Network (Adult Swim) little over a year ago now and I think enough time has passed that I can talk about some juice details about what has and was going on over there, I got hired on around 2018 and worked by many different projects both on the air today and some that never happened.

Ask me whatever you want about anything, I'm also gonna drop random info no one cares - about so stay tuned for that!

"Smiling Friends" Success directly led to "Learning with Pippy" never getting greenlit, Zack and Michael basically snitched to executives about what kind of audience that show would attract and got others (myself included) to say we would all walk away from the company.

Original filename: LearningWithShitty.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 63] AI Pokemon Thread /NAPT/ Thread 184: Enchanting Bellelba Edition
item.description:
This is a general thread for people to post their AI art, and make requests from others who may want to attempt making their own Pokemon related gens.

NovelAI is a paid AI generator. Opus tier users have "unlimited" Small/Normal generations, though editing tools require credits.

Microsoft's Bing AI is a free image generator that is powered by DALL·E 3.

Civitai is free using its ‘buzz’ currency. You get about 50 every day plus more for liking models and gens.
>civitai.com

Otaiku is a (mostly) free mobile app. An ad watch is required between each image generation unless you pay.
>ailla.biz/otaiku

Tensor is free to use as well, although you are limited to how many gens you can make per day.
>https://tensor.art/

Local Generation using Stable Diffusion requires a decent video card. Guides for local genning can be found in the /g/ threads:
>>>/g/sdg
>>>/g/ldg
Other Stable Diffusion threads are on: /h/, /e/, /d/, /b/, /vt/, /aco/, /trash/

Hailuo AI takes uploaded art and animates them based on the prompts you get. You get a 3-day free trial, followed by roughly 3 free gens a day afterward. Subscription plans are available.
>https://hailuoai.video/

Pastebin of Pokemon artists:
>https://pastebin.com/U0mmK3Tm (embed)

Characters with under 300 images will require more tags to have them look correct. This is a list of all Pokemon characters with over 300 images:
>https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts?tags=*_%28pokemon%29+&z=5

If you plan on sharing multiple images together, we'd recommend posting just one, and give links for the rest. This way we can conserve space.

This is a locally run html tool provided by ThatOneAiAnon. It keeps track of all artists you like and turns Danbooru's entire tag system in a collapsible list of buttons. You can edit all the js, css, html code to modify the tool. (Ask him for updated versions or more Nai4 tools)
>mega .nz/file/67xwTRSB#m0fPUmJRaWd3oh47gt6nw2LKNMe820TaiKdXTAhx8tI

Previous Thread:>>57762891

Original filename: 1746721333547095.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 41] Jonathan Hickman's X-Men, His "Most Disappointing Creative Experience"
item.description:
Jonathan Hickman says that his X-Men run was his "most disappointing creative experience" but also explains why.


Jonathan Hickman calls his X-Men run his "most disappointing creative experience" due to unfinished plans.
The Krakoan era was meant as just the first of three arcs, but he couldn't complete the full story he intended.
Hickman praises his collaborators and editors, stressing no bad blood despite the project's derailment.
He confirms new Marvel work but says he doesn't plan to return to X-Men or Avengers anytime soon.


love a wide-reaching Jonathan Hickman interview, because he just says stuff. Stuff that we suspected, stuff that we wondered about, stuff confirming stories that Bleeding Cool has only been able to report as rumours before. He recently talked to David Harper for the Off Panel podcast, to talk about his career and work and to spill some tea along the way. Including looking on his X-Men run that began with House Of X and Power Of X. And this little segment on the Krakoan age, intended to be the first arc of a three arc structure by Hickman, only for him to be moved on by Marvel Comics as the the other X-book creators chose to continue that original first arc for much longer. Hickman states;

"It is the most disappointing creative experience I've had because I didn't finish the story I set out to do, which is a cardinal sin and a total bummer… I've tried to reverse engineer how it could have worked. I don't think there's a version of it where it wasn't me not getting to finish it. So you know it's a lot of business stuff, Covid stuff, publishing schedule stuff … It was a perfect storm of really, really bummer things that just derailed the project, and so it's really, really difficult for me to talk about it or think about it in any kind of positive aspect. Because I would've crushed it.

Original filename: maxresdefault vvv.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 63] Luigi was right
item.description:
>The group, which is seeking unspecified damages, argued that the public backlash [to the shooting] prevented the company from pursuing "the aggressive, anti-consumer tactics that it would need to achieve" its earnings goals.

https://www.cnbc.com/2025/05/08/unitedhealthcare-sued-by-shareholders-over-reaction-to-ceos-killing.html

A group of investors sued UnitedHealthcare Group

on Wednesday, accusing the company of misleading them after the killing of its CEO, Brian Thompson.

The class action lawsuit — filed in the Southern District of New York — accuses the health insurance company of not initially adjusting their 2025 net earning outlook to factor in how Thompson's killing would affect their operations.

On Dec. 3 — a day before Thompson was fatally shot — the company issued guidance that included net earnings of $28.15 to $28.65 per share and adjusted net earnings of $29.50 to $30.00 per share, the suit notes. And on January 16, the company announced that it was sticking with its old forecast.

The investors described this as "materially false and misleading," pointing to the immense public scrutiny the company and the broader health insurance industry experienced in the wake of Thompson's killing.

The group, which is seeking unspecified damages, argued that the public backlash prevented the company from pursuing "the aggressive, anti-consumer tactics that it would need to achieve" its earnings goals.

"As such, the Company was deliberately reckless in doubling down on its previously issued guidance," the suit reads.

Original filename: file.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [375] Viv could've had a more interesting story if she portrayed her demons in Helluv
item.description:
Viv could've had a more interesting story if she portrayed her demons in Helluva Boss existing under an oppressive culture that rewards cruelty and cynicism while discouraging sincere affection and love resulting in many hellborn quickly melting in response to genuine empathy like viltrumites. It would have even fit her liberal ideals of fighting against oppressive power structures. I find it notable and odd then that her characters not only rub elbows with those in power so often but that said authority figures are portrayed so sympathetically and benevolently. We still see shades of her wanting to portray Blitzo as a "working class hero" but the narrative she set up is (unsurprisingly) schizophrenic and directionless.
Also Stolas is a shit.

Original filename: nword.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 54] US-UK Trade Deal
item.description:
UK and US announce trade deal to save thousands of British jobs, Starmer says

https://news.sky.com/story/uk-and-us-agree-trade-deal-as-starmer-and-trump-make-announcement-in-live-phone-call-13363710

The UK and US have agreed a trade deal, with Sir Keir Starmer and Donald Trump confirming the announcement during a live televised phone call.

It is the first trade deal agreed after Mr Trump began his second presidential term in January, and after he imposed strict tariffs on countries around the world in April.

Sir Keir said the "first-of-a-kind" deal with the US will save thousands of jobs across the UK, boost British business and protect British industry.

Original filename: starmer_trump.jpg

item.title: [ 99] /tpg/ /rcg/ - Theme Park & Roller Coaster General
item.description:
Disneyland Abu Dhabi Edition

>Last Thread: >>2779327

>What is this thread? Why are there two companies?
Disney parks were initially founded as a way to celebrate the culture and history of America and provide middle class families with a fun-filled immersive experience. While theme parks are the main focus of these threads (and the title of the general) there is also discussion on other roller coasters & rides, as well as the parks themselves and trip planning too. That's where /rcg/ comes in.
>Can I talk about Disney/Universal parks in this thread?
Absolutely! Disney and Universal are currently competing for the Orlando theme park market and beyond! Universal is opening new resorts all around the US and new continents!

Thread Pro Tip: Talk about theme parks!

Park Crowd Tracker:
>https://queue-times.com/en-US/parks

Roller Coaster Database:
>https://rcdb.com/

Amusement Park News Sites:
>https://www.themeparkinsider.com/
>https://www.screamscape.com/
>https://www.coaster101.com/

Disney Park News:
>https://www.wdwnt.com/
>https://www.wdwmagic.com/
>https://www.allears.net
>https://www.mousesteps.com

>News
Disneyland Abu Dhabi announced as Disney's 7th resort and first in Middle East. Miral Group (United Arab Emirates government) will entirely fund and operate the park
https://disneyparksblog.com/disney-experiences/disney-announces-abu-dhabi-theme-park/
Epic Universe officially opens in two weeks, but previews are showing heavy operational issues
https://wdwnt.com/2025/05/breaking-harry-potter-and-the-battle-at-the-ministry-to-temporarily-close-during-final-week-of-epic-universe-previews/
And your local theme parks are probably open for weekends now

item.title: [211] /tcg/ Trading Card Game General
item.description:
Why So Cirrus Edition

>I want to learn the game, where do I begin?
Download PTCGL at https://tcg.pokemon.com/en-us/tcgl
The game has a quick tutorial and a bunch of decent decks to get you started against other beginners or against the AI. Some of those decks are very close to meta too. You can also go to your local game store and see if people are playing Pokémon.

>I know how to play, how do I make my own deck?
You have a decent beginner's guide at https://www.justinbasil.com/guide
There's also the old /tcg/ guide at https://imgur.com/a/W4NkOu6
After that, look up meta decks and try to reverse engineer them to see how things work.

>Where to find meta decks?
For big irl events, go to https://limitlesstcg.com/decks
For online events, go to https://play.limitlesstcg.com/decks?game=PTCG
For japanese events, go to https://pokecabook.com/archives/1417

Previous thread: >>57755719

Old /tcg/ pastebin: https://pastebin.com/Ge95YuMA

Original filename: 126958494_p0.png

item.title: [ 37] Hey voyagers, The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread
item.description:
Hey voyagers,

The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread open for suggestions:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/trv/ is a slow board, so don't expect immediate responses. CHECK THE CATALOG – you might find threads already discussing topics you're interested in.

Before asking for suggestions, tell /trv/ about your:
>Budget
>Interests
>Level of understanding of the local language(s)
This makes it easier to give quality advice. Of course, keep your posts travel related.

For all other matters:
General culture questions >>>/int/
Politics discussion >>>/pol/
Transportation discussion >>>/n/
Outdoors-related discussion >>>/out/

For more information about safety, planning and other miscellaneous topics, check out the pastebin:

GENERAL INFO:
https://pastebin.com/yR1SAr3s

Note: Discussions of prostitution or sex tourism are not permitted on /trv/.

item.title: [ 68] Anybody from a third-world country ever (legally) travel to the US?
item.description:
Is it really as hard as it seems? My friend in Colombia is trying to visit the US but it seems unreasonably hard to get a tourist visa. Do they really require an in-person interview at the US embassy in Bogota? He doesn't live anywhere near Bogota, how is that reasonable to expect him to travel all the way to Bogota ? Is there any way around that or can he do the interview over the phone? He's just trying to get a tourist visa, not become an immigrant, so why make him pay for a flight and take extra days off work just for a tourist visa?

And how long does it actually take to get a tourist visa approved? How long in advance does he need to plan the trip?

Original filename: US-visa-1366x768-2187306852.jpg
item.author: Anonymous
